member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.Version
member.summary: The supported version for loading Chunk files (Version 3).

member.name: T:DSCript.ChunkType
member.summary: An enumeration for holding values of every possible type within a Chunk file

member.name: E:DSCript.DSC.ProgressUpdated
member.summary: An event that is called when a progress update is reported. The sender object can be a null value.

member.name: M:DSCript.DSC.Update(System.Object,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Sends a progress update to the event handler.
member.param: The object sending a progress update.
The message of the update being reported.
The current progress of the update being reported. Optional.

member.name: M:DSCript.DSC.GetLastUpdate
member.summary: Returns the most recently reported progress update.
member.returns: A object containing the progress data.

member.name: M:DSCript.DSC.Update(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Sends a progress update to the event handler with a null sender object.
member.param: The message of the update being reported.
The current progress of the update being reported. Optional.

member.name: M:DSCript.IniConfiguration.AppendText(System.String)
member.summary: Appends the string to the end of the Ini file.
member.param: The string to append.

member.name: F:DSCript.CopyClassType.SoftCopy
member.summary: Copy the top-level of the class, reusing any class/struct members as-is.

member.name: F:DSCript.CopyClassType.DeepCopy
member.summary: Deeply copy the class, nesting into any class/struct members.

member.name: T:DSCript.ICopyClass`1
member.summary: Interface for creating a new copy instance of a class.
member.typeparam: The type of class a copy will be created of.

member.name: M:DSCript.ICopyClass`1.Copy(DSCript.CopyClassType)
member.summary: Create a copy of the class using the specified copy type.
member.param: The type of copy to perform.
member.returns: A copy of the class.

member.name: T:DSCript.ICopyClassTo`1
member.summary: Interface for copying to an existing instance of a class.
member.typeparam: The type of class to copy to.

member.name: M:DSCript.ICopyClassTo`1.CopyTo(`0,DSCript.CopyClassType)
member.summary: Copies the class to another instance using the specified copy type.
member.param: The object to copy data to.
The type of copy to perform.

member.name: T:DSCript.ICopyCat`1
member.summary: Interface for creating new/copying to instances of a class.
member.typeparam: The type of class that will be newly created and/or copied to.

member.name: M:DSCript.ICopyCat`1.CanCopy(DSCript.CopyClassType)
member.summary: Validates data can be copied from this class.
member.param: The type of copy to check if can be performed.
member.returns: True if the class can be copied; otherwise, False.

member.name: M:DSCript.ICopyCat`1.CanCopyTo(`0,DSCript.CopyClassType)
member.summary: Validates data can be copied to the class instance.
member.param: The object to check if can be copied.
The type of copy to check if can be performed.
member.returns: True if the class can copy to the instance; otherwise, False.

member.name: M:DSCript.ICopyCat`1.IsCopyOf(`0,DSCript.CopyClassType)
member.summary: Checks if the specified class instance is already a copy of the specified copy type of the class.
member.param: The object to check if is a copy of the specified copy type.
The type of copy to check the object with.
member.returns: True if the instance is a copy of the class of the specified copy type; otherwise, False.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the vertex.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Normal
member.summary: Gets or sets the normals of the vertex.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.Vertex.UV
member.summary: Gets or sets the UV mapping of the vertex.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the RGBA diffuse color of the vertex.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.Vertex.BlendWeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the blending weights of the vertex.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Tangent
member.summary: Gets or sets the tangent of the vertex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Model.VertexBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the Vertex Buffer to use when accessing vertices

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.ModelPackageLoadLevel.FastLoad
member.summary: Loads in the header only.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.ModelPackageLoadLevel.Materials
member.summary: Loads in the header and materials.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.ModelPackageLoadLevel.Models
member.summary: Loads in the header, materials, and models.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.ModelPackageLoadLevel.Default
member.summary: Loads in everything.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.SubModel.ModelPackage
member.summary: The this mesh belongs to.

member.name: M:DSCript.Parser.TokenReader.ReadInTokens
member.summary: Reads in the tokens on the next line and returns the number of tokens loaded.
member.returns: The number of tokens parsed, otherwise -1 if end of stream reached.

member.name: M:DSCript.Parser.TokenReader.ReadToken
member.summary: Reads the next valid token from the buffer and increments the token index.
member.returns: The next valid token from the buffer; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:DSCript.Parser.TokenReader.PeekToken
member.summary: Gets the next token from the buffer without incrementing the token index or filling the buffer.
member.returns: The next token from the buffer; otherwise, null.

member.name: F:DSCript.Spooling.ChunkSchemaType.Sequential
member.summary: Chunks are expected to be in sequential order. Faster, but more prone to failing.

member.name: F:DSCript.Spooling.ChunkSchemaType.NonSequential
member.summary: Chunks are not expected to be in sequential order. Slower, but less likely to fail.

member.name: F:DSCript.Spooling.ChunkSchemaType.Default
member.summary: Specifies the default schema type. See the type for more info.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolerExtensions.GetFirstChild(DSCript.Spooling.SpoolablePackage,DSCript.ChunkType)
member.summary: Returns the first child matching the specified .
member.param: The .
The to find.

member.name: T:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolerEventHandler
member.summary: Represents a delegate for handling spooler events.
member.param: The spooler who triggered this event.
The event arguments accompanying the spooler.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.FileName
member.summary: Gets the filename of the chunker, if applicable. A null value means nothing was loaded.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.IsLoaded
member.summary: The state of the chunker, whether any files have been loaded or not.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.IsCompressed
member.summary: Gets or sets if the chunker uses LZW-compression.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.CanLoad
member.summary: Determines whether or not the chunker can load a file.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.CanSave
member.summary: Determines whether or not the chunker can save a file.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.Content
member.summary: Gets the content of this chunker.

member.name: E:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.SpoolerLoaded
member.summary: An event that is called when a spooler is loaded from a file. The event args are unused.

member.name: E:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.FileLoadBegin
member.summary: An event that is called prior to the chunker loading a file. The event args are unused.

member.name: E:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.FileLoadEnd
member.summary: An event that is called when the chunker finishes loading a file. The event args are unused.

member.name: E:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.FileSaveBegin
member.summary: An event that is called prior to the chunker saving a file. The event args are unused.

member.name: E:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.FileSaveEnd
member.summary: An event that is called when the chunker finishes saving a file. The event args are unused.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.OnSpoolerLoaded(DSCript.Spooling.Spooler,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Represents a method that is called when the chunker loads a spooler from a file. The default behavior fires the event.
member.param: The spooler that was loaded.
Unused.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.OnFileLoadBegin
member.summary:
Represents a method that is called prior to the chunker loading a file. Ideally, this method should be used to set up any uninitialized variables.
The default behavior fires the event.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.OnFileLoadEnd
member.summary: Represents a method that is called when the chunker finishes loading a file. The default behavior fires the event.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.OnFileSaveBegin
member.summary:
Represents a method that is called prior to the chunker saving a file. Ideally, this method should be used to ensure all content is ready to be saved.
The default behavior fires the event.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.OnFileSaveEnd
member.summary: Represents a method that is called when the chunker finishes saving a file. The default behavior fires the event.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.GetBuffer(DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer)
member.summary: Retrieves a buffer using data provided from the specified spooler. Intended for internal use only.
member.param: The spooler
member.returns: The buffer from the file for the spooler.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.WriteChunk(System.IO.Stream,DSCript.Spooling.SpoolablePackage)
member.summary: Writes the specified block of chunked data to the current position in a given . The length of the stream should be set prior to calling this method.
member.param: The stream to write to.
The chunked data.
member.exception: Thrown when the amount of chunked data exceeds the length of the stream.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.WriteChunk(System.String,DSCript.Spooling.SpoolablePackage)
member.summary: Creates a new file with the specified name and writes a block of chunked data to it.
member.param: The file to write to.
The chunked data.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the contents of the file into the file chunker, and overwrites any existing content.
member.param: The file to load.
member.returns: True if the chunker loaded the file; otherwise, false./

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.Save
member.summary: Saves the contents of the chunker into the original file, overwriting any existing data.
member.returns: True if the chunker saved the file; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.FileChunker.Save(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the contents of the chunker into the specified file, overwriting any existing data.
member.param: The file to save.
Determines if the stream should be updated. The default is value 'true'.
member.returns: True if the chunker saved the file; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.ISpoolableResource.Spooler
member.summary: Gets or sets the spooler this resource will access during its lifetime.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.ISpoolableResource.Load
member.summary: Loads the contents of the spooler into the resource.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.ISpoolableResource.Save
member.summary: Saves the contents of the resource into the spooler.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.FileOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the file offset of this spooler. Intended for internal use only.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.FileChunker
member.summary: Gets or sets the file chunker for this spooler. Intended for internal use only.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.GetMemoryStream
member.summary: Returns a based on a local copy of the buffer. Changes made to the local copy will not reflect upon the buffer attached to the spooler.
member.returns: A based on a local copy of the buffer. local copy of the buffer.
member.remarks: This method is a shortcut for creating a new using the method.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.GetBuffer
member.summary: Returns a local copy of the buffer. Changes made to the local copy will not reflect upon the buffer attached to the spooler.
member.returns: A local copy of the buffer.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.SetBuffer(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the content of the buffer. If this spooler is attached to a parent, the parent will adjust its size accordingly.
member.param: The buffer containing the new data.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.ClearBuffer
member.summary: Clears the contents of the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableBuffer.Size
member.summary: Returns the size of the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolablePackage.Children
member.summary: Gets the collection of children attached to this spooler.

member.summary: Represents an abstract spoolable resource class. Inherited classes should be created using the method.
member.typeparam: The type of this spoolable resource is based on.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResource`1.GetInterface
member.summary: Returns the public interface for a spoolable resource.
member.returns: The public interface for a spoolable resource.

member.name: T:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResourceFactory
member.summary: A static class for creating new spoolable resources.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResourceFactory.Create``1
member.summary: Creates a new spoolable resource.
member.typeparam: The type of spoolable resource to create.
member.returns: A new spoolable resource of the specified type.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResourceFactory.Create``1(DSCript.Spooling.Spooler)
member.summary: Creates a new spoolable resource from the specified spooler.
member.typeparam: The type of spoolable resource to create.
member.param: The spooler of which a new spoolable resource will be created from.
member.returns: A new spoolable resource of the specified type, created from the specified spooler.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResourceFactory.Create``1(DSCript.Spooling.Spooler,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new spoolable resource from the specified spooler, and alternatively loads the content from it immediately.
member.typeparam: The type of spoolable resource to create.
member.param: The spooler of which a new spoolable resource will be created from.
Determines if the spooler should be loaded upon creation.
member.returns: A new spoolable resource of the specified type, created from the specified spooler. If specified, the content is loaded first before returning.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResourceFactory.AsResource``1(DSCript.Spooling.Spooler)
member.summary: Returns the spooler as a new spoolable resource of the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type of spoolable resource to create.
member.returns: A new spoolable resource of the specified type.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.SpoolableResourceFactory.AsResource``1(DSCript.Spooling.Spooler,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the spooler as a new spoolable resource of the specified type, and alternatively loads the content from it immediately.
member.typeparam: The type of spoolable resource to create.
member.param: Determines if the spooler should be loaded upon creation.
member.returns: A new spoolable resource of the specified type. If specified, the content is loaded first before returning.

member.summary: Disposes of the resources used by this spooler.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Description
member.summary:
Gets or sets the description for this spooler. The length should not exceed 255 characters.
Setting this value to 'null' will force an empty string to be used instead.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Context
member.summary: Gets or sets the context of this spooler.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.BaseOffset
member.summary: Gets the absolute position of this spooler, relative to its parent. If this spooler is not attached to a parent, this will return zero.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of this spooler. Intended for internal use only.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of this spooler.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the byte-alignment of this spooler.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of this spooler. If an inherited class does not implement this property, a value of zero is always returned.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.Parent
member.summary: Gets the containing this spooler. If no parent is attached, the value is null.

member.name: P:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.IsDirty
member.summary: Gets or sets the dirty status of this spooler.

member.name: M:DSCript.Spooling.Spooler.EnsureDetach
member.summary: Ensures the spooler has been detached from its parent, if applicable.
